trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma referência a um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given an URL.
trans-unit.target: Descoberta de serviços Web XML envolve a descoberta de serviços Web XML disponíveis fornecidos uma URL.

trans-unit.source: The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a URL aponta para um documento de descoberta, que geralmente tem a extensão de nome de arquivo a.disco.

trans-unit.source: The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas, or other discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: O documento de descoberta contém referências a informações sobre a existência dos XML Web services, como descrições de serviços, esquemas do XML Schema Definition language (XSD) ou outros documentos de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa uma referência a um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the value of href.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe, definindo o o valor da propriedade href .

trans-unit.source: Reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Referência a um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref*> property is set to the value of `href`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref*>propriedade é definida como o valor de `href`.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do arquivo padrão a ser usado ao salvar o documento de descoberta referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document to a file.
trans-unit.target: Nome do arquivo padrão a ser usado ao salvar o documento referenciado em um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the referenced discovery document as a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo do documento de descoberta referenciado como um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the discovery document has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.
trans-unit.target: Se o documento de descoberta não foi baixado e adicionado ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, é feita uma tentativa de fazer o download e resolver o documento.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> representing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> que representa o conteúdo do documento de descoberta referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- An error occurred during the download or resolution of the XSD schema using <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>. - ou - ocorreu um erro durante o download ou a resolução do esquema XSD usando <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Reads and returns the discovery document from the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Lê e retorna o documento de descoberta do passado <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém o documento de descoberta.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> que contém o conteúdo do documento discovery referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a referência a um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: For most references, the Ref property is a URL, such as http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.
trans-unit.target: Para a maioria das referências, a propriedade de referência é uma URL, como http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.

trans-unit.source: Reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Referência a um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that all referenced documents within the discovery document are valid.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se todos os documentos referenciados dentro do documento de descoberta são válidos.

trans-unit.source: Unless you specifically need to resolve the individual references of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> object, you should invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificamente necessário resolver as referências individuais de um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>objeto, você deve chamar os <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>métodos de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> ou</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all references to discovery documents, XSD schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> and any references found in referring discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Este método resolve todas as referências a documentos de descoberta, esquemas XSD e descrições de serviços no <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>e todas as referências encontradas documentos de descoberta para se referir.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The discovery document could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o documento de descoberta não pôde ser baixado e verificado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a URL do documento de descoberta referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A URL do documento de descoberta referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Writes the passed <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> into the passed <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Grava o passado <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> no passado <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> to write into `stream`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> para gravar em `stream`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> into which the serialized discovery document is written.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>em que o documento de descoberta serializado é gravado.</xref:System.IO.Stream>
